meanings.definition: A formal assurance that certain conditions will be fulfilled.
meanings.sent1: The guarantees in the contract ensure our safety.
meanings.sent2: The guarantees of quality make customers trust the product.
meanings.sent3: His guarantees of winning the game made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The guarantees of success are like a shield against failure.
meanings.sent5: The guarantees of happiness brighten our future.

meanings.definition: To provide a formal assurance or promise.
meanings.sent1: She guarantees to finish the project on time.
meanings.sent2: He always guarantees a warm welcome to guests.
meanings.sent3: The magician guarantees a rabbit will appear out of thin air.
meanings.sent4: His smile guarantees to brighten anyone's day.
meanings.sent5: The sun guarantees a beautiful sunrise every morning.

meanings.definition: Something that assures a particular outcome.
meanings.sent1: The weather forecast guarantees a sunny day tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: The insurance policy provides guarantees for accidents.
meanings.sent3: The lucky charm guarantees good luck in all endeavors.
meanings.sent4: Her determination guarantees success in her career.
meanings.sent5: The recipe guarantees a delicious meal every time.
